page.title: 01THE ENVIRONMENT
page.content: . This area of Surrey is a mixture of rural and urban communities. At the centre is the village of Lyne which is surrounded by farmland. On the eastern side is the town of Chertsey, an urban community with shops and houses. To the south is St. Peters Hospital and White Lodge Centre for handicapped children. In the north-west corner are the outskirts of Virginia Water. The area is bisected by the M25 motorway which runs north to south and by the M3 motorway which runs west to east. There are seven farms:- Trumps Farm, Almners Barn Farm, Hardwick Court Farm, France Farm, Fan Court Farm and Hersham Farm.
